DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate effect multimodal pre-operative prehabilitation programme neo-adjuvant therapy cardiopulmonary exercise performance insulin resistance prior resection oesophago-gastric cancer .
DOC.brief_title: Does Prehabilitation Improve Exercise Performance Insulin Resistance After Surgery Oesophago-gastric Cancer ?
DOC.detailed_description: The trial objective follow : Primary : To evaluate effect prehabilitation programme neo-adjuvant therapy CPX performance prior resection oesophago-gastric cancer . Secondary : To investigate impact neo-adjuvant chemotherapy insulin resistance ; determine whether prehabilitation exercise programme feasible neo-adjuvant chemotherapy ; determine whether rehabilitation positive impact quality life outcome ; investigate impact prehabilitation clinical outcome ; assess effect prehabilitation nutritional status ; determine whether prehabilitation affect stress response surgery . This study randomise control trial patient stratify 'fit ' 'unfit ' group base upon anaerobic threshold randomise 1:1 ratio receive multimodal prehabilitation standard care prior OG cancer surgery , neo-adjuvant chemotherapy .
